instruction: Move the slider to observe the effect of the magnet on the bundle of burnt and unburnt matchsticks suspended by strings.

options.feedback: There is no influence of magnet on either of bundles.
The magnet attracts the burnt matchsticks, indicating a presence of magnetic material.

question: Which of the following is getting reduced in the following reaction? $$ CuO + H_2 → Cu + H_2O$$
solution:
• Reduction is a process which involves the addition of hydrogen or the removal of oxygen atom.
 • Since oxygen is being removed from CuO, hence it is being reduced in the given reaction.
summary: You just explored that magnetic materials are attracted to magnets when kept near to them.
